articles.author: Steve Aschburner
articles.title: 2025 NBA Finals: 4 things to watch for in Game 3 - NBA
articles.description: Excitement is high for Indiana as the Pacers take on the Thunder in the team's 1st NBA Finals home game in 25 years.
articles.content:
Heading into Game 3 with the series tied at 1-1, Isiah, Shaq and Kenny break down the outlook for the Thunder and Pacers.
INDIANAPOLIS — The last time this city played host to an NBA Finals game was… [+6700 chars]
